content:
Hi {{ fullName }},

{% if availablePaymentTerms == "Invalid" %}

Thank you for choosing ImHereTravels. We truly appreciate your interest in our {{ tourPackage }}.

Refund Details for Your Booking

Unfortunately, we're unable to process your booking because the tour is scheduled to begin within 48 hours. Due to the limited time, we're not able to complete the necessary arrangements to ensure a smooth and quality travel experience for you.

We'd love to help you explore other options. You may rebook a different tour with a later start date by reaching out to us directly, and we'll be happy to assist.

Regarding your deposit of £{{ reservationFee }}, please let us know your preferred refund method. Kindly send us your bank details so we can process the refund promptly.

Thank you for your understanding, and we hope to assist you on your next adventure.

Best regards,

The ImHereTravels Team

{% endif %} {% if availablePaymentTerms != "Invalid" and availablePaymentTerms != "Full payment required within 48hrs" and availablePaymentTerms != "P1" and availablePaymentTerms != "P2" and availablePaymentTerms != "P3" and availablePaymentTerms != "P4" %}

Thank you for booking with ImHereTravels!

Your deposit of £{{ reservationFee }} has been received, and we're thrilled to have you join us for an unforgettable adventure!

{% endif %} {% if availablePaymentTerms == "Full payment required within 48hrs" %}

subject: Your Adventure Awaits - Booking Confirmed!
name: Booking Confirmation

subject: Your Adventure Awaits - Booking Confirmed!
content:
Dear {{ fullName }},

We’re reaching out with unfortunate news regarding your upcoming {{ tourPackage }} scheduled for {{ tourDate }}.

Due to unforeseen circumstances, we regret to inform you that this tour has been cancelled. We understand how disappointing this may be and sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.

You have a couple of options moving forward:

  • Reschedule: We’d be happy to help you rebook the same tour for a future date or explore other travel packages that may suit your schedule.
  • Refund: If you prefer a full refund of {{ cancelledRefundAmount }}, please send us your bank details and we’ll process it promptly.

Our team is ready to assist you and ensure this experience is handled with care. If you have any questions or need support, don’t hesitate to contact us directly.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Warm regards,

The ImHereTravels Team
name: Cancellation Email

subject: Payment Reminder - Action Required

content:
Hi {{ fullName }},

Thank you for selecting your payment method and plan. We're excited to have you join us for {{ tourPackage }}!

Please take a moment to review the details below and ensure everything looks correct:

  • Tour: {{ tourPackage }}
  • Payment Plan: {{ paymentPlan }}
  • Payment Method: {{ paymentMethod }} {% if paymentMethod == "Stripe" %}
    Pay securely online with Stripe {% elif paymentMethod == "Revolut" %}

    • BIC: ULSBGB2B

    • [Details will be provided separately]
    {% endif %}

We've outlined your payment terms and due dates below. To ensure you don't miss any payments, please click 'Yes' to add the payment due date reminders directly to your calendar.

Payment Tracker

{% for term in terms %} {% endfor %}
Payment Term Amount Due Date Add to Calendar
{{ term.name }} {{ term.amount or "" }} {{ term.dueDate or "" }} {% if term.calendarLink %} Calendar link {% else %} - {% endif %}
Total {{ remainingBalance }}

You'll receive a reminder 3 days before each payment is due, ensuring you have plenty of time to stay on track. We've also added the payment due dates to your calendar for easy reference.

If you need any assistance or have questions, feel free to reach out to us.

Warm regards,
The ImHereTravels Team
